name: phivolcs-scraper-backend
description: Backend service for scraping PHIVOLCS earthquake data

scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { const fs = require('fs'); const path = './node_modules/puppeteer/install.js'; if (fs.existsSync(path)) { require('child_process').execSync('node ' + path, { stdio: 'inherit' }); } } catch(e) { process.exit(0); }"
